title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. It only takes focus if I drop down the combo list.
OB: The first Combo does not take focus when clicked on.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and the focus should go to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
